attributes.action: Ferguson: Westminster should condemn the US Grand Jury decision not to indict Darren Wilson
attributes.additional_details: A call for Westminster to officially condemn the actions taken by the US Grand Jury and Police Forces surrounding the killing of a young Black man in Ferguson, Missouri, and to stand in support of the American Black community and the family of Michael Brown. The failure to indict Darren Wilson for the unjustified shooting of Michael Brown is a racist mechanism which all world citizens are complicit in unless we speak out. Let the USA know that the people of the UK do not condone the absence of justice which is clearly present.
